/**
 * @jsdoc directive
 * @name helpHint
 * @restrict A
 * @description
 * The `helpHint` directive allows the component to add a textual hint.
 * @element ANY
 * @example Example that demonstrates basic bindings via helpHint directive.
 <example>
 <file src="src/components/helpHint/docs/helpHint-examples.html" name="index.html"></file>
 </example>
 */
 
export default class HelpHint implements ng.IDirective {
    public restrict = "E";
    public transclude = true;
    public replace = true;
    public template = "<div class=\"xui-help-hint xui-input-help\" xui-help-hint-transclude></div>";
}
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Fri Dec 15 2017 19:51:34 GMT+0000 (UTC)
